services.name: AI Automation for Real Estate
services.description: AI-powered chatbots, voice assistants, lead qualification, predictive analytics, and workflow automation built for real estate professionals.

services.name: Analytics & Performance Tracking
services.description: Custom KPI dashboards, ROI reporting, marketing attribution, and data-driven insights that help real estate professionals make smarter decisions and maximize returns.

services.name: Branding & Market Positioning
services.description: Strategic brand identity, visual design, market positioning, and brand storytelling that differentiate your real estate business and attract ideal clients.

services.name: Content Marketing
services.description: Attract qualified buyers, sellers, and investors with strategic real estate content — blog posts, market reports, neighborhood guides, and more that build authority and generate organic leads.

services.name: Conversion Rate Optimization
services.description: A/B testing, landing page optimization, funnel analysis, UX improvements, and data-driven CRO strategies that turn more visitors into leads and clients.

services.name: CRM & Sales Automation
services.description: CRM setup, pipeline management, automated follow-ups, lead routing, and sales automation systems that help real estate teams close more deals with less effort.

services.name: Email Marketing
services.description: Drip campaigns, newsletters, automated sequences, list segmentation, and email marketing strategies that nurture leads and keep you top of mind with clients.

services.name: Home Buying Assistance
services.description: Expert guidance through every step of the home buying journey — from finding the perfect property to negotiating the best deal and closing with confidence.

services.name: Home Inspection Services
services.description: Comprehensive home inspection services for buyers and sellers — 150+ point inspections, 48-hour report delivery, and 100% licensed inspectors you can trust.

services.name: Home Selling Services
services.description: Sell your home faster and for top dollar with expert pricing strategy, professional staging, stunning photography, and aggressive marketing that attracts qualified buyers.

services.name: Investor & Project Launch Marketing
services.description: Launch campaigns for real estate investors, developers, and new construction projects. Pre-launch marketing, investor targeting, digital strategy, PR placement, and sales collateral.

services.name: Lead Generation
services.description: Multi-channel lead generation for real estate agents and teams. Facebook & Instagram lead ads, Google PPC, SEO leads, home valuation pages, IDX capture, and referral campaigns.

services.name: Paid Advertising
services.description: Drive qualified buyer and seller leads with high-performance paid advertising campaigns across Google, Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube — built exclusively for real estate professionals.

services.name: Property Management Services
services.description: Professional property management for landlords and investors. Tenant screening, rent collection, maintenance coordination, property marketing, lease management, and financial reporting.

services.name: Real Estate Investment Consulting
services.description: Expert real estate investment consulting — market analysis, portfolio strategy, ROI projections, acquisition due diligence, and investment property marketing for investors.

services.name: Reputation Management
services.description: Online reputation management for real estate professionals — review generation, monitoring, negative review resolution, Google Business Profile optimization, and social proof marketing.

services.name: Sales Funnel Automation
services.description: Full-funnel automation for real estate — funnel strategy, landing pages, lead magnets, automated nurture sequences, retargeting funnels, appointment booking, and funnel analytics.

services.name: SEO for Real Estate
services.description: Dominate local and organic search results with real estate SEO strategies that drive qualified buyer and seller traffic to your website — month after month.

services.name: Social Media Marketing
services.description: Grow your real estate brand with strategic social media management — content creation, agent branding, reels, community management, and lead generation across Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn & TikTok.

services.name: Strategic Growth Planning
services.description: Comprehensive growth strategy for real estate businesses — market analysis, business planning, revenue forecasting, team scaling, geographic expansion, and competitive positioning.

services.name: Video Marketing
services.description: Cinematic property tours, drone footage, agent branding videos, social media reels, and testimonial films that sell homes faster and build your real estate brand.

services.name: Website Design & Development
services.description: Custom real estate websites with IDX integration, lead capture, SEO optimization, and stunning design. Mobile-first, fast-loading sites built to convert visitors into clients.

services.name: WhatsApp Marketing
services.description: WhatsApp Business API marketing for real estate — broadcast campaigns, automated chatbots, CRM integration, listing alerts, and client communication that drives engagement and closings.
